heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly cloudy south. Partly to mostly cloudy north. Chance of a shower in the St. Lawrence Valley and in the northern mountains, slight chance elsewhere from Route 2 northward. Lows from the upper 40s to mid 50s, except mid to upper 40s in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Winds becoming north to northwest at 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny in southeastern valleys, otherwise decreasing clouds. Valley highs from the upper 60s to mid 70s in the south, and mainly mid to upper 60s north, but with some lower 60s far north. North to northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Becoming clear. Lows in the low to mid 40s in the Champlain valley, mid 30s to around 40s south, low to mid 30s in northern areas outside the Champlain Valley, except mid to upper 20s in northern cold hollows. Northwest winds gusting to 15 mph early, then diminishing to 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens, and to less than 5 mph in the east.
